entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: SE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
